public class  BNEPanel
     extends com.shafir.jct.JctHeavyPanel

A panel containing a Bayesian Network Editor. The JctFlowChart is probably inappropriate because a new LayoutManager would have to be written. The GrapherPanel gives this panel scrollbars.
